column5: http://ca.news.yahoo.com/blogs/daily-buzz/karen-gwillim-saves-bird-camera-solves-photo-mystery-220608183.html  After she took a camera away from a bird in Saskatchewan, she went looking for the rightful owner of the images.  Frank Resendes and his friends from a fishing trip months ago may finally get their pictures back after the camera took an unexpected swim.  It isn't known exactly what happened to the camera between that trip in March and when it was found a few weeks ago, but a bird plays a big role.
Heard this on CBC yesterday. Pretty cool story.  That'll be one fisherman who doesn't hate cormorants anymore.
That's awesome, hopefully they get that camera back. Also, those are some monster wallys they caught.
